pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pyx12 is a HIPAA X12 document validator and converter. It parses an ANSI X12N data file andvalidates it against a representation of the Implementation Guidelines for a HIPAA transaction. By default, itcreates a 997 response for 4010 and a 999 response for 5010. It can create an html representation of the X12document or can translate to and from an XML representation of the data file.
